Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.final_lab.controller.CustomerController
@Controller public class CustomerController extends Object
CustomerController handles all web requests related to Customer management.

Responsibilities include:

  • Displaying all customers
  • Adding new customers
  • Editing and updating existing customers
  • Deleting customers
  • Generating savings projections for a customer

This controller uses:

  • CustomerRepository for database operations
  • ProjectionService for calculating investment projections

      model - the model to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the index view

    • addForm

      @GetMapping("/add") public String addForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form for adding a new customer.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass a new Customer object to the view
      Returns:
      the add view

    • saveCustomer

      @PostMapping("/save") public String saveCustomer(@ModelAttribute Customer customer, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Saves a new customer to the database. Prevents duplicate customer numbers.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to save
      model - the model to pass error messages if needed
      Returns:
      redirect to index if successful, otherwise reload index with error

    • editForm

      @GetMapping("/edit/{id}") public String editForm(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form for editing an existing customer.
      Parameters:
      id - the customer ID
      model - the model to pass the customer to the view
      Returns:
      the edit view

    • updateCustomer

      @PostMapping("/update") public String updateCustomer(@ModelAttribute Customer customer, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates an existing customer in the database. Prevents duplicate customer numbers across different records.
      Parameters:
      customer - the updated customer
      model - the model to pass error messages if needed
      Returns:
      redirect to index if successful, otherwise reload edit with error

    • deleteCustomer

      @GetMapping("/delete/{id}") public String deleteCustomer(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a customer by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the customer ID
      Returns:
      redirect to index after deletion

    • projectInvestment

      @GetMapping("/project/{id}") public String projectInvestment(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Generates and displays the savings projection for a customer.
      Parameters:
      id - the customer ID
      model - the model to pass customer and projection data to the view
      Returns:
      the project view
